about_the_game:
Evil forces swarm and threaten to destroy all of time. A small jumping spider must swing into action to save the past, present and future from multiversal invasion!

Swing and sling webs
Use webs to swing around levels at breakneck speed, or shoot them to string together enemies for combo attacks. You can even manipulate the environment, flinging objects and turning hazards into deadly traps.

Gather items across time
Collect items from the past, present, and future, each with their own effects and synergies! Tailor your build to harness the power of space-age technology, the force of primal evolution, or a paradoxical fusion of the two!

Save the past, present, and future
Battle against bugs, both robotic and prehistoric, to defend the timeline from attack by time-spanning forces. Aided by the dubious Time Snail, jump head-first through time and close the portals before defeating powerful boss-bugs.

name: Websling

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800 GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Websling is an action roguelike game about swinging, battling bugs and collecting powerful items. Bouncing between the past and the future, players take control of a small jumping spider who must use their webs to defeat powerful foes from across time and space.
